<b>Description:</b> <br>


Hi!<br>
I am a postdoctoral researcher at Carleton University since August 2022, working with Professor [Mehdi Ammi](https://carleton.ca/sppa/mehdi-ammi-2/) under his CIHR grant on "Public Health Finance". <br>
I received my PhD in Economics at the University of Ottawa, Canada supervision of [Lilia Karnizova](https://uniweb.uottawa.ca/?lang=fr#!/members/914) and <br> 
[Raul Razo-Garcia](https://sites.google.com/site/razogarciahomepage/). <br>


<b>Research interests:</b> <br>

I am a macroeconomist with a specialization in quantitative econometrics. My expertise is in international economics, public health, macroeconomics, and applied econometrics.
